description: Beef shin becomes meltingly tender when slow cooked in this rich and impressive stew with earthy porcini.
keywords: Rich Beef Shin & Wild Mushroom Stew
name: Rich Beef Shin & Wild Mushroom Stew Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bring to the boil, reduce the heat and simmer for 2.5 hours with the lid on. Remove the thyme and bones, scraping any marrow out and back into the sauce.
